description.ruby-sapphire:
Tears at the foe with sharp
claws. May lower DEFENSE.
description.emerald:
Tears at the foe with sharp
claws. May lower DEFENSE.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is attacked
with sharp claws.
It may also lower
the foe’s DEFENSE.

sharp claws.
It may also lower the
target’s Defense.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
